sections.title: What is the Rally Network?
sections.description: The Rally Network is an emerging blockchain ecosystem focused on giving Creators new ways to build their businesses and achieve deeper engageement with their communities, with better fan alignment and more control than they have ever had before.

questions.a: Apart from payment and transaction processing fees, the Rally Network will not colelct fees for profit from transactions or seek revenue from Creator economies.
